channel.title: Client Cache Downloader... - ReDownloading
channel.description: Alright, so i got this problem, In my client i got my 'Cache Downloader' to work, however i came down with this problem - Where - When my Client Downloads the Cache off my 'Cache Host' the Client says to reload because it has been updated, BUT, When i reload the client, it starts downloading the cache again, not quite sure why it does this, or how to fix it :S any help would be GREATLY APPRECIATED. please, post any methods, to fix, or e-mail me at emp@darkdrift.org - Thanks.

item.title: Client Cache Downloader... - ReDownloading
item.dc:creator: @seasons_best seasons best
item.description:
@seasons_best wrote:

Alright, so i got this problem, In my client i got my ‘Cache Downloader’ to work, however i came down with this problem - Where - When my Client Downloads the Cache off my ‘Cache Host’ the Client says to reload because it has been updated, BUT, When i reload the client, it starts downloading the cache again, not quite sure why it does this, or how to fix it :S any help would be GREATLY APPRECIATED. please, post any methods, to fix, or e-mail me at emp@darkdrift.org - Thanks.

Read full topic
